Now the companies at the forefront of the skin-care turnaround are trying to maintain their following. Vicky Tsai, a 40-year-old former financier, started Tatcha LLC nearly a decade ago after she was introduced to centuries-old beauty customs used by Japan’s geisha that cleared up her own skin problems. Today her cleansing oils and moisturizing creams are among the most popular skin-care brands in the U.S. Copyright ©2023 Dow Jones & Company, Inc.
